lyrics:
104 contributorstranslationsportuguÃªswe are the champions lyricsverse 1
ive paid my dues
time after time
ive done my sentence
but committed no crime
and bad mistakes

prechorus
ive had my share of sand kicked in my face
but ive come through and i mean to go on and on and on and on
chorus
we are the champions my friends
and well keep on fighting till the end
we are the champions
we are the champions
no time for losers
cause we are the champions
of the world
verse 2
ive taken my bows
and my curtain calls
you brought me fame and fortune and everything that goes with it
i thank you all
but its been no bed of roses
no pleasure cruise
you might also likeprechorus
i consider it a challenge before the whole human race
and i aint gonna lose and i mean to go on and on and on and on

chorus
we are the champions my friends
and well keep on fighting till the end
we are the champions
we are the champions
no time for losers
cause we are the champions
of the world
